text:
Hi there python developers!! I am currently using the HubSpot-api-cli 3.4.2 for invoking the APIs for my project. Right now, our team has decided to work with marketing events. Although I do not see the "marketing-events" in any of the cms/crm packages in the github repo here: <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-api-python/>

Is this because Marketing Events is still in beta version in HubSpot? I have thought about a work around where I will have to use requests module from boto3 client and make the requests by passing URLs, parameters as shown here.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/marketing/marketing-events>

If there is any python dev who is working on marketing events from HubSpot, please let me know your thoughts.

Merry Christmas!!!

Thank You,
Manosij

I'm having some trouble on the last steps of prepping our app, and getting cards to show on the contact record.

The message on the card shows as "There was a problem reaching Courses. Please refresh the page to try again or contact the app developer for support.", and when I query the hook and watch the log trace while in my contact record I can clearly see the data.

{"results":[{"objectId":"621UdueSNJ","title":"The Successful Bookkeeper Book","link":"<https://www.thesuccessfulbookkeeper.com/app/library/get-the-successful-bookkeeper-free|https://www.thesuccessfulbookkeeper.com/app/library/get-the-successful-bookkeeper-free>","progress":0,"access":"Granted","status":"Not Started"},{"objectId":"7EPhlShUH4","title":"Fast Track Your Success","link":"<https://www.thesuccessfulbookkeeper.com/app/library/fast-track-your-success|https://www.thesuccessfulbookkeeper.com/app/library/fast-track-your-success>","progress":0,"access":"Granted","status":"Not Started"}]}

I'm really not sure what I'm missing here. Data request is setup, card properties, and I don't have any actions.

Unlikely, but top of my mind, is that I wrote a reeeally bad query that tipped my fetch endpoint performance past the 5 second timeout, which caused this behavior for me even while I was returning `200`s.
Are you in a spot where you can stub a fake response payload to see if you can get something to render? That would be my next move.
I did find troubleshooting these problems particularly difficult; the feedback loop totally breaks once HubSpot has the response.
Can someone tell me how we can get a list of the emails and not the mail body in the marketing email listing api?
i would just like get a list of only the mail title, id, and a few other specific fields instead of the mail body
